title: Google Students Club
text: Google Students Club, IIT Kharagpur is a group dedicated to outreach, planning, and organization of workshops, events, and activities related to technology, programming, open source code and community to the people of IIT Kharagpur. One of the main goals of the group is to leverage the technologies provided by Google to enable these processes.

title: History
text: Google Students Club was started in IIT Kharagpur in 2014 with Samidha Paroha as the Google Student Campus ambassador. Later, 5 other members joined as core team members: Vivek Rai, Anirudh Thyagharajan, Gaurav Verma, Apurva Swarnakar. In 2015, Gaurav Verma was elected as the next campus ambassador.

title: Activities
text: They conducted a several events events like Doodle Quiz, Doodle Designing, Trivia, Rubik's Cube and Sudoku Solving with Bitwise . [ 1 ]
